column2: # Prepare the data for the stacked bar chart
stacked_bar_vis <- ggplot(snl_topics_bar_data, aes(x = date, y = mentioned_count, fill = topic)) +
facet_wrap(~ candidate, ncol = 1) +  # Separate by candidate
scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Set3", name = "Topic") +  # Use a color palette for topics
title = "SNL Mentions by Topic Over Time",
axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1),  # Rotate x-axis labels for readability
